description:
Having been invited to participate in Dance Road, Haneru`s full of motivation. The members of Tribe Cool Crew decides to use a new song, and begin creating a routine for it. When it turns out that they don`t have a confirmed center, Haneru volunteers for the role.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dance Road, Here We Come! Who`ll Be the Center?!
Iza Dance Road e! Center wa Dare!?
いざダンスロードへ! センターは誰!?
